titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation touching the excise layd by the advice of the Lords and Commons of Parliament assembled at Oxford.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: At end: Given at Our Court at Oxford, the 24th day of April, in the twentieth yeare of our reigne. God save the King.
Arms 37; Steele notation: We and contrary.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
